maqras.text: Man is certainly hasty (by) character
when evil afflicts him he is impatient
and when good (even) touches him (he) is niggardly
except the worshippers (those who offer salat)
who are constant at their worship (salat)
and in whose wealth there is a known (portion as the) right
of one who asks and of one who is deprived (yet does not ask)
and those who accept the truth of the day of judgment
and those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord
the punishment of their Lord is certainly (something from which) one should not feel secure
and those who guard their private parts
except from their wives or whom their right hands possess, so in their case they are not to be blamed
but whoever seeks (something) beyond that, then those are the persons who are transgressors
and those who are faithful to their trusts and their agreements
and those who stand firm on their testimonies
and those who are custodians of their worship (salat)
They will be honoured in gardens
So what is the matter with those who do not believe that they rush towards you
from your right and from your left, in groups
Does every man among them hope that he will be made to enter the garden of bliss
By no means ! they know (the thing) from which We created them
So I do swear by the Lord of the rising places/times and setting places/times (of the sun), that We are certainly able
to replace (them by others) better than them and We are not to be overcome
So leave them involved in idle talk and play, till they meet their day which they are promised
The day they will come out from their graves in haste, as if rushing towards a goal
(with) their eyes humbled, disgrace covering them, that is the day which they were promised
We had sent Noah to his people, (saying), “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes on them.”
He said, “O my people ! I am a clear warner to you
that you should serve (worship) God and fear Him and obey me
He will (for give and) protect you from your sins and give you time till an appointed term. When the term of God comes (to an end), it will certainly not be postponed, had you but known.”
He said, “My Lord! I invited my people (towards You) night and day
but my invitation did not increase in them anything except running away (from the truth)

And whenever I invited them that You will protectively forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears and covered, themselves with garments and persisted (in refusing) and considered themselves great (due to) pride
Then I invited them aloud
then I invited them publicly and secretly in private
then I said: Seek protective forgiveness of your Lord, He is certainly Protectively Forgiving
He will send on you abundant rain from the sky
and will help you with wealth and sons and He will make gardens for you and He will make rivers for you
What is (wrong) with you, do you not expect God to be serious (about the above promises)
And He has created you (through) different stages
Did you not consider how God created the seven skies (higher levels) in accordance with each other
and made the moon therein (a source of reflected) light and made the sun a lamp
And God caused you to grow from the earth (as a) growth
then He returns you into it and He will bring you out, a bringing out
And God has made the earth a wide expanse for you
that you may move therein on wide ways.”
Noah said, “My Lord, they disobeyed me, and followed him whose wealth and children added to him nothing but loss
And they planned a great plan
And they said: Do not leave your gods, nor leave Wadd, nor Suwa nor Yagus and Yauq and Nasr
And they have misled many, and You do not (give) increase to the unjust persons in anything but error.”
They were drowned because of their faults, then made to enter the fire, and they did not find for themselves any helpers besides God
And Noah said, “My Lord! do not leave on the earth any dweller from among the disbelievers
for if you leave them they will mislead your servants and they will not give birth to any but transgressing, ungrateful (children)

My Lord ! protectively forgive me and my parents and him who enters my house as a believer, and the believing men and the believing women and do not (give) increase to the unjust persons, in anything but ruin.”
